command-runner.commands.Run build (summary output): make/scripts/cleanup.sh    &&   make/scripts/create_build_script.sh summary   &&   make/scripts/sync2ibmi.sh   &&   make/scripts/run_build.sh;   make/scripts/sync_back_from_ibmi.sh; make/scripts/git-cache-meta.sh --store
command-runner.commands.Run build (detailed output): make/scripts/cleanup.sh   &&   make/scripts/create_build_script.sh detailed   &&   make/scripts/sync2ibmi.sh   &&   make/scripts/run_build.sh;   make/scripts/sync_back_from_ibmi.sh; make/scripts/git-cache-meta.sh --store
command-runner.commands.Run build (debug): make/scripts/cleanup.sh debug   &&   make/scripts/create_build_script.sh debug   &&   make/scripts/sync2ibmi.sh debug   &&   make/scripts/run_build.sh debug;   make/scripts/sync_back_from_ibmi.sh debug; make/scripts/git-cache-meta.sh --store
command-runner.commands.Merge with production: git pull && git -c 'core.editor=code --wait --reuse-window' merge main && git push && echo 'Done' && git rev-parse HEAD >> commit.log

commands.name: $(symbol-property) Reset all
commands.command: git restore .; git reset; git clean -fd

commands.name: $(run-all) Build all
commands.command: make/scripts/cleanup.sh   &&   make/scripts/create_build_script.sh   &&   make/scripts/sync2ibmi.sh   &&   make/scripts/run_build.sh debug;   make/scripts/sync_back_from_ibmi.sh;  make/scripts/git-cache-meta.sh --store
